name: Shelterplads ved Egå Engsø - fem stk.
Bålhus på Tumlepladsen i Riis Skov
Aarhus Skating Rink
description: Indoor skating rink. Only open from March-October

name: Aarhus Beach Volley
description: Aarhus Beach Volley club, where volleyball fields can be rented. Has indoor facilities during the winter months

name: ARoS
description: ARoS is the main art museum in Aarhus and a unique international art museum for young as old.  ARoS has been awarded two Michelin stars in Michelin's tourism guide

name: KØN - Gender Museum Denmark
description: State-run cultural & historical museum examining women's experiences in Denmark throughout the ages.

name: The Cathedral of Aarhus
description: Gothic church dating from the 12th century dedicated to Saint Clement, with fresco-covered arches.

name: Aarhus Theatre
description: Inaugurated in 1900, this theater features a decorative facade & lavish interiors.

name: Viking Museum
description: Underground Viking museum with interactive exhibits, model streets & archaeological artifacts.

name: Museum of Ancient Art
description: Museum showcasing ancient Mediterranean casts & objects, from the Bronze Age to the Roman Empire.

name: Natural History Museum
description: Educational museum featuring 5 exhibits of preserved animals, geological history & a gift shop.

name: Steno Museum
description: Science museum featuring several permanent exhibitions aimed at children & adults alike.

name: Botanical Garden
description: Grassy lawns & greenhouses with Mediterranean, desert & tropical plants, plus picnic tables.

name: Musikhuset
description: Live music venue with several different types of music and shows.

name: Rådhusparken
description: Small, relaxed city park featuring garden areas, open lawns, large trees & various sculptures.

name: Mølleparken
description: Walks, sports & striking public sculptures by the canal, plus bar terraces & live bands in summer.

name: Godsbanen
description: Workshops open for public use dealing in pottery, metal & woodwork, graphic design & laser cutting.

name: Badeanstalten Spanien
description: Indoor pool and spa with sauna and steam showers

name: Marselisborg  Slotspark
description: The gardens beloning to the Danish Queen's summer residence. The castle itself is not open to the public from the inside, from the park surrounding it is.

name: Mindeparken
description: English-style gardens surrounding a royal palace, with a war memorial, a playground & sea views.

name: The Infinite Bridge
description: Scenic, round bridge by the ocean

name: Marselisborg Marina
description: Marina where you can eat food, gets drinks and eat icecream

name: Ceres Park Arena
description: Home Stadium of Aarhus' football team, AGF

name: Tivoli Friheden
description: Traditional carousel & Ferris wheel, plus 5D cinematic rides & laser games in family amusement park.

name: Outdoor Skating Rink by Musikhuset
description: Outdoor skating rink. Only open from mid-November to mid-February.

name: Kunsthal Aarhus
description: Modern arts museum since 1917 with rotating exhibits of works in many mediums, a cafe & courtyard.

name: DGI Huset
description: Gym & sports complex with facilities for indoor climbing, group exercise classes & a cafe/bar.

name: Aarhus Watersports Complex
description: Watersports activities with wakeboards, water skis and SUP rentals

name: Surf Agency
description: Stand Up Paddleboard club with rental possibilities and outdoor spa facilities

name: Svalegangen Theater
description: Performing arts theater in the center of Aarhus

name: LOCKED Escape Room
description: Escape room center with several different rooms

name: Theater Group 38
description: Small, intimate theater at Aarhus Ø

name: Ingerslev Torv
description: Market with foodstands every Wednesday and Saturday

name: Dokk1
description: Dokk1 is the main library in Aarhus with media, a café, public events, project rooms, study rooms, art, a children's library, and a playground.

name: Vor Frue Kirke
description: The Church of Our Lady (Danish: Vor Frue Kirke) is one of the larger church structures of Århus, Denmark. The church and associated structures were built in several stages in the course of the Middle Ages, from the late 1200s to 1500 AD.

name: Vor Frue Kirke (Catholic Church)
description: Catholic Church of Our Lady (Danish: Katolske Vor Frue Kirke) is a church in Aarhus, Denmark. The church is situated in the central Indre By neighbourhood on the pedestrian street Ryesgade, close to the Central Station and City Hall. It is a catholic church under the Roman Catholic Diocese of Copenhagen; built between 1877 and 1880 by designs of the German architect Franz Schmitz and later renovated by the architect Carl R. Frederiksen.

name: St. Pauls Kirke
description: St Paul's Church is a parish church in Aarhus, Denmark. It was completed in 1887 to a design by Vilhelm Theodor Walther in the Neo-Romanesque style.

name: Tangkrogen
description: Tangkrogen is a public park and area in Aarhus near the beach. The park is situated near the city centre by the coast and close to the Marselis Wood.

name: Jydsk Væddeløbsbane
description: The Jutland Racecourse is a public racecourse in Aarhus, Denmark.

name: Skanseparken
description: Skanseparken is one of the oldest parks in the city of Aarhus. It is situated in the neighborhood of Frederiksbjerg in Midtbyen.

name: Havnerundfart - Aarhus Sail Event
description: Aarhus Sail Event offers harbor tours of Aarhus Harbor and Bay. Aboard the ship M/S Helene, and experience and enjoy Aarhus from the water. See the new district of Aarhus Ø and listen to the interesting and fun stories that guides form Aarhus Sail Event add to the tour along the way.

name: Sportspladsen Havnefronten
description: At Sportspladsen Havnefronten you can play basket, football or the like. The place offers a great sea view and sports activities.

name: CinemaxX
description: CinemaxX in Aarhus is located in Bruuns Galleri and offers both 3D and IMAX cinema halls.

name: Det Kgl. Bibliotek
description: The State and University Library is a national library and the university library of Aarhus University.

name: Escape Factory
description: Escape room with several different rooms and games.

name: Brain Escape
description: Escape room with several different rooms and games.

name: Urban Escape game
description: Uban escape game where the puzzle/game to be solved is located at several sites around Aarhus.

name: Urban Escape game
description: Uban escape game where the puzzle/game to be solved is located at several sites around Aarhus.

name: Escape Tour
description: Uban escape game where the puzzle/game to be solved is located at several sites around Aarhus.

name: Escapist
description: Escape room with several different rooms and games.

name: Aarhus VR
description: Virtual Reality Center located in Brabrand

name: Eventpark Aarhus
description: Eventpark Aarhus resides many activities such as VR-escape room, lasertag, bouncy castles, trampolines, airhockey, arcade games, and much more.

name: Bålplads ved Moesgård Strand - Ndr. Strandmark
Bålplads ved Moesgård Strand - Sdr. Strandmark
Bålplads på stranden ved Blommehaven Camping
Marselisborg Deer Park
description: Free nature preserve & zpp with free-ranging wild boar & deer

name: Moesgaard museum
description: Moesgaard Museum is a popular destination for museum enthusiasts and nature lovers alike. The new museum building is the venue for world-class prehistoric and ethnographic exhibitions. Situated in the undulating landscape south of Aarhus, the museum constitutes a unique trinity of nature, culture, and history.
